page.title: 07Population movement.
page.content: We conducted a survey of the three schools in our area to try and discover whether many people came to live in the area from outside.The per- centage of the poll returned was Round -hill 56%, Redhill 63%, Airedale First 37%.We questioned only the parents of the children at school and did not go back to the previous generation More people appear to have moved into Ferry bridge (56%) than into Airedale (45%). Approximately one third appear to have moved into their present house from within a 5 mile radius of where they now live and about the same number from other places in Yorkshire.About 17% have moved into Ferrybridge from the N.E.,12.5% have moved into Aire- dale from the south,3% from Germany. Some of these have been in the armed forces.More people have moved into Ferrybridge because of their jobs.
